III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
1.) The facility is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes.
2.) This facility does not fall under MISEP requirements.
3.) The facility does not have a DHHS Contract.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility did not require technical assistance.
V. CONSULTATION
The facility did not require consultation.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
There have not been any corrective action plans during this licensing period.
The renewal inspection was completed on March 3, 2020. The facility was found in
substantial compliance with all applicable rules and statues.
VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules and/or MISEP requirements and/or contract and policy. It is
recommended that the facility continue on their regular license.
